properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PASSWORD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER( USER_NO ,USER_ID ,USER_PASSWORD ,USER_NICKNAME ,USER_NAME ,EMAIL ,PHONE ,ENROLLDATE ,GENDER ,ADDRESS ,PREFER ,IMAGES ,STATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ?, ?, null, 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_PASSWORD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
